text: Ba is a province in Fiji. It is in the Western Division. It is on Viti Levu, Fiji's largest island. There were about 245,000 people living there in 2017, the most of any province. It covers a land area of . Ba Province includes the towns and districts of Ba, Magodro, Nadi, Nawaka, Tavua, Vuda and Vitogo. The city of Lautoka and the Yasawa Archipelago are also in Ba Province. Category:Provinces of Fiji
title: Ba Province
